stepAnswer: Yes, using this syntax: GROUP BY Field1, Field2
stepTitle: Is it possible to group by two fields, and if so what would be the correct syntax?
choices: Yes, using this syntax: GROUP BY Field1 GROUP BY Field2
No, applying multiple grouping in the same statement is not allowed.
Yes, using this syntax: GROUP BY Field1, Field2
Yes, multiple grouping is allowed, but only if the grouped fields have the same data type.
